**Request for Proposal: Photography Services**
================================================

### Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-583-78380618
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Solicitation Number**: N24-20230392-001
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-04-29
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-15T14:00:00

### Contract Details

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-06-03
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

### Service Description

The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC) invites proposals for photography services. The selected service provider will be responsible for capturing various images of the research council's activities, laboratories, and facilities. 

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria for this RFP are based on a combined score of technical merit and price. Proposals will be evaluated on the following criteria:

*   Technical merit (50% of the combined score)
*   Price (50% of the combined score)

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers who are Canadian residents or are registered as a Canadian GST/HST number holder.

### Regions of Opportunity

*   Canada
*   New Brunswick
*   Nova Scotia
*   National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Newfoundland and Labrador
*   Saskatchewan
*   British Columbia
*   Alberta
*   Manitoba

### Regions of Delivery

*   Canada
*   New Brunswick
*   Nova Scotia
*   National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Newfoundland and Labrador
*   Saskatchewan
*   British Columbia
*   Alberta
*   Manitoba

### Attachment

Attachments may be found at [canadabuys.canada.ca sites,default files webform tendernotice36395/english-rpf-n24-20230488-photography-services](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36395/english-rpf-n24-20230488--photography-services-%282.pdf).
